name: ID-EFENDER
description:
A remake of the 1981 Atari's classic - "Defender".  Control a military plane in the lovely background setting of Edinburgh and defend it's citizens from incoming waves of alien spaceships. Protect the piper, once the aliens snatch him - it's game over...

Controls:

Enter - start

Arrows - control plane

Z - shoot

Developed in Monogame with C#
